key_responsibilities: Experimented, error analysed and integrated multiple models (YOLOv5, WPOD-Net, ...), resulted in more than 98% in term of accuracy.
Deployed trained model on NVIDIA Jetson Xavier device. Built server-client protocol to verify system pipeline and dockerized product.
Experimented, error analysed and integrated multiple deep models to achieve high performance.
Created pipeline for system continuous training and monitoring using Wandb.
Researched, developed and ensembled several detection models for comparative analysis (mostly YOLOv5 and CenterNet).
Research, optimized and benchmarked different tracking models (DeepSORT, FairMOT), resulted in approximately 85% in term of MOTA metric on collected dataset.
Leaded data team and annotation pipeline, including data collection, extraction, annotation and quality verification.
Created partial automation pipeline with re-identification models to support annotation process, resulted in x2 annotation speed compared to traditional method.
Collaborated to generate the largest multiple-camera tracking dataset compared to existing datasets in terms of camera, tracking area, and human ID quantities.
Collaborated to design new algorithm for tracking across multiple cameras using different techniques, namely camera calibration, top-view representation, feature matching, etc.
